page.title: 08A Roof Over Our Heads
page.content: Even though there are many beatiful ,well kept homes with attractive gardens in our town there is very little employment for their owners.Banchory is now regarded as a dormitory community,for a high percentage of the residents must travel to Aberdeen,the massive oil centre of Europe,for work a practice which many people employ daily. It is now very expensive to live in this beautiful part of{Deeside}with house prices ranging from forty thousand pounds to well over a hundred thousand.A prospective buyer coming to {Banchory}will find the veiws afforded to them over the Dee Valley so breathtaking that very few leave with out deciding that this is where their future dream home will be situated!
